title: Streaming [Currently taking constructive critisim]
body:
Apologies if this is the incorrect place to post, but a friend and I are currently "Stress testing" an alternative stream account that will be used daily from the 23rd of November. 

Currently live, would appreciate some constructive criticism if any of you have some spare time :) thankyou very much, and feel free to close if this is in the wrong place.
